Importance: High

client-ip=217.204.130.186; envelope-from=MikeK@nr-online.com;
helo=email.nr-online.com;
Message-ID: <EXCHFRONT027mvjkO2200000356@smtp02.theplanet.com>
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 27 Oct 2006 09:56:42.0253 (UTC)

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sirs, 
 
The site www.cricketspot.com / www.vlivecricket continues to offer
illegal streams to the ICC Champions Trophy which started on Saturday
7th October 2006. Please see the main page of the site for your
reference. 
 
We have already sent a Cease & Desist notification to both the site
owner and "abuse" at ThePlanet on behalf of our client the ICC (see
below). 
 
Since the ICC is the owner of the exclusive rights in question, and
since NetResult has already provided a notice to The Planet that
complies with the requirements of the Copyright Act, either ThePlanet
shuts down the infringing website or it faces vicarious liability for
permitting your client, www.cricketspot.com / www.vlivecricket.com to
continue to infringe the ICC's rights. 
 
Please advise me of the action you can take. 
 
Regards, 
 
Mike Kiernan  
 
Projector NetResult Ltd,
Mulberry House,
583 Fulham Road,
London, 
SW6 5UA     
 
mikek@nr-online.com 
 
www.nr-online.com 
 
+44 (0)20 7471 1730
+44 (0)7092 313 434 (Fax)
  
This email and the documents attached to this email contain information
which is confidential and / or privileged. If you are not the intended
recipient, you are notified that any dissemination of this communication
is strictly prohibited. 
 
-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com]
Sent: 25 October 2006 16:18
To: sales@cricketspot.com; cricketspot.com@domainsbyproxy.com
Cc: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: GCC: ICC Champions Trophy 2006 infringements- ICC_NRID13462
Importance: High
Sensitivity: Confidential 
 
 
GCC: ICC Champions Trophy 2006 infringements- ICC_NRID13462 
 
NetResult Internal Reference:  ICC_NRID13462 
 
Please quote the above ICC_NRID13462 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue. 
 
Dear Sirs, 
 
We write on behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global
Cricket Corporation Pte Limited  which owns and/or controls the
worldwide broadcast rights for the ICC Champions Trophy 2006. 
  
We have noticed that your website, http://www.vlivecricket.com/ is
displaying, promoting and or offering A/V content from the ICC Champions
Trophy 2006. All copyright in such images vest with ICC Development
(International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited. 
 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from the ICC
Development
(International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited to
use this content, your present use is an infringement of the ICC
Development
(International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited
rights.  
 
Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so. 
 
Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of ICC Development (International)
Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited rights or remedies,
including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement not
explicitly stated, whether 
current or in the future, all of which are expressly reserved.    
 
 
Formal Declaration 
 
I hereby state that ICC Development (International) Limited and Global
Cricket Corporation Pte Limited are the owners of the exclusive rights
to the A/V content referenced above and that NetResult is authorized to
act on ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket
Corporation Pte Limited behalf with respect to internet monitoring and
compliance related to infringement of such rights. 
 
 
On behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket
Corporation Pte Limited, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief
that use of such A/V content in the manner complained of is not
authorized by ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket
Corporation Pte Limited, its agents, or the law. 
 
We thank you for your timely and full cooperation. 
  
I, Mike Kiernan, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate. 
 
Yours sincerely, 
 
Mike Kiernan 
 
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA 
 
Tel: 0207 471 1733 
 
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.
